content: “Rumor has it that a land once thought to be mythical has been found by a group of space ‘explorers’, but is it true though? Who knows?”— from the latest Twitter of PUGGAs the trailer Twitter is released, we can see PUGG is launching with a mysterious legend and will introduce its metaverse soon.PUGG has made every effort to build its unique metaverse which will surely bring a revolutionary immersive game experience as well as a revolutionary commercial mode to NFT holders, crypto businesses and all the other Web3 users.Metaverse, as is defined, is a world of endless, interconnected virtual communities where people can meet, socialize, work and play, by using different kinds of virtual reality devices.Now the word “metaverse” is being mentioned everywhere...﻿To read more: https://pugg-io.medium.com/revolutionary-pugg-metaverse-is-coming-c2247354d09chttps://miro.medium.com/max/1308/1*XRwjrldmAf4qVxV9bkvqcQ.jpeg
